title: Gilead Sciences, Inc.
description: Gilead Sciences, Inc. is a research-based biopharmaceutical company focused on the discovery, development, and commercialization of innovative medicines.
cleaned_text: Gilead COMPASS Initiative® Marks Five Years of Collaboration to Combat the HIV Epidemic in the U.S. South At its midway point, the 10-year, more than $100 million Gilead COMPASS Initiative has had a transformative impact on the landscape of HIV in the Southern U.S. Explore the partnerships featured in the ["5 Years, 5 Voices" video series](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCN-ZDfs33CtMfaCTP3Ao4eMlDy4Fg3V8), read more in a [special academic journal issue](/news-and-press/press-room/press-releases/2023/8/gilead-sciences-and-meharry-medical-college-highlight-five-year-impact-of-gilead-compass-initiative-on-hiv-in-the-southern-united-states) and [join in on the progress](/purpose/partnerships-and-community/compass). Our Purpose We've been taking on the world's biggest health challenges for more than 35 years. We continue to set and achieve ambitious goals to create a healthier world for all
